abstract: The words of a fourth-generation American helped transform the original meaning of the Statue of Liberty into a beacon for those arriving in America for the first time.
snippet: The words of a fourth-generation American helped transform the original meaning of the Statue of Liberty into a beacon for those arriving in America for the first time.

headline.main: How a Sonnet Made a Statue the 'Mother of Exiles'
headline.print_headline: How a Sonnet Turned a Statue Into the ‘Mother of Exiles’
